contest-event.event-date:
July 11, 1931 D Belle Vue July Contest (Class A)
Belle Vue July Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Belle Vue July Contest belle-vue-july-contest-class-a
Faust [Berlioz, unknown arranger]
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes 1st £30, 2nd £20, 3rd £10, 4th £8, 5th £7.
Source - The Musical Progress and Mail, August 1931.
March contest held in conjunction with Class B. 1st Bentley Colliery, 2nd Dove Holes Public, 3rd Blackburn Steel Works, 4th Cadishead, 5th Hull Waterloo.
April 17, 2011, 6:05 p.m. Oct. 18, 2012, 4:47 p.m.
1 Dove Holes Band J. A. Greenwood
2 Slaithwaite Band Noel Thorpe
3 Denton Original S. Myers
4 Penketh Tannery J. A. Greenwood
5 Cadishead Band J. Jennings
Unknown Result Bentley Colliery W. Wormald
Unknown Result Blackburn's Steel Works Band J. Birkett
Unknown Result Dobcross Silver Band J. Jennings
Unknown Result Rivington and Adlington Band T. Anderton
Unknown Result Leyland Subscription Thomas Smalley
